title: Market share of UK gambling industry sectors by GGY 2009 to 2014
summary: This is a multi-line chart with 6 lines representing Betting, Casino, Remote, Bingo, Arcades, and Lottery. The y axis denotes SOME LABEL and the x axis denotes Year.
Overall Remote is gradually increasing, Betting, and Arcades are gradually decreasing, Casino, Bingo, and Lottery are roughly constant,  throughout the Year
Overall across the Year, Betting mostly maintained the highest SOME LABEL when compared to others with a mean value of 49.6, and it peaked at 2009/10, and 2010/11.
Followed by Casino which ranks as the second topmpost line , with an average of 15.2 SOME LABEL,reaching its highest point  at 2013/14 with a value of 16.0.
Lottery mostly had the least SOME LABEL with a mean value of 4.0, which peaked at 2011/12, and 2013/14 with a value of 5.0.

The botommost line, Lottery,  has a mean of 4.0, and peaked at 2011/12, and 2013/14.
